channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress

item.title: CVE-2023-0176|2023-02-06T19:59:46.410Z -- unknown -- giveaways%20and%20contests%20by%20rafflepress
item.description: The Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress WordPress plugin before 1.11.3 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
